org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq

Interface FastqFileDataStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, DataStore<FastqRecord>, FastqDataStore, TraceDataStore<FastqRecord>

    public interface FastqFileDataStore
extends FastqDataStore
    FastqFileDataStore is a FastqDataStore where all the FastqRecords in the datastore belong to the same .fastq file.
    Author:
    dkatzel
    Since:
    5.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      Create a FastqFileDataStore of all the records in the given fastq file with the given DataStoreProviderHint to help jillion choose a datastore implementation.

      Create a FastqFileDataStoreBuilder of all the records in the given fasta file.

      Create a FastqFileDataStore of all the records in the given fastq file with the given DataStoreProviderHint to help jillion choose a datastore implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • getQualityCodec

        FastqQualityCodec getQualityCodec()
        Get the FastqQualityCodec that was used to encode all the FastqRecords in this file. This is useful for when processing a fastq file and you want any output fastq files to use the same fastq quality codec as the input files.
        Returns:
        a FastqQualityCodec; may be null if there are no records in the fastq file depending on the implementation of the FastqDataStore.

      • getFile

        Optional<File> getFile()
        Get the actual File that this datastore wraps. Note, because of datastore filtering and other decorators, the file may contain additional reads not present in this datastore and the FastqRecords that are present, may not match 100% to the input file.
        Returns:
        an Optional File, if it is known.
        Since:
        5.2

      • fromFile

        static FastqFileDataStore fromFile(File fastqFile)
                            throws IOException
        Create a FastqFileDataStoreBuilder of all the records in the given fasta file. Warning! This usually stores all the records in memory use fromFile(File, DataStoreProviderHint) or FastqFileDataStoreBuilder to handle the file or datastore implementation differently.
        Parameters:
        fastqFile - the fastq file make a FastqFileDataStoreBuilder with; can not be null and must exist.
        Returns:
        a new FastqFileDataStore; will never be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the fastq file does not exist, or can not be read.
        NullPointerException - if fastqFile is null.
        Since:
        5.3
        See Also:
        NucleotideFastaFileDataStoreBuilder, fromFile(File, DataStoreProviderHint)

      • fromFile

        static FastqFileDataStore fromFile(File fastqFile,
                                   FastqQualityCodec codec)
                            throws IOException
        Create a FastqFileDataStoreBuilder of all the records in the given fasta file. Warning! This usually stores all the records in memory use fromFile(File, DataStoreProviderHint) or FastqFileDataStoreBuilder to handle the file or datastore implementation differently.
        Parameters:
        fastqFile - the fastq file make a FastqFileDataStoreBuilder with; can not be null and must exist.
        codec - the FastqQualityCodec to use; can not be null.
        Returns:
        a new FastqFileDataStore; will never be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the fastq file does not exist, or can not be read.
        NullPointerException - if either parameter is null.
        Since:
        5.3
        See Also:
        NucleotideFastaFileDataStoreBuilder, fromFile(File, DataStoreProviderHint)

      • fromFile

        static FastqFileDataStore fromFile(File fastqFile,
                                   DataStoreProviderHint hint)
                            throws IOException
        Create a FastqFileDataStore of all the records in the given fastq file with the given DataStoreProviderHint to help jillion choose a datastore implementation. If filtering records is desired, pleas use FastqFileDataStoreBuilder.
        Parameters:
        fastqFile - the fastq file make a FastqFileDataStore with; can not be null and must exist.
        hint - the DataStoreProviderHint to use; can not be null.
        Returns:
        a new FastqFileDataStore; will never be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the fasta file does not exist, or can not be read.
        NullPointerException - if any parameter is null.
        Since:
        5.3
        See Also:
        NucleotideFastaFileDataStoreBuilder

      • fromFile

        static FastqFileDataStore fromFile(File fastqFile,
                                   FastqQualityCodec codec,
                                   DataStoreProviderHint hint)
                            throws IOException
        Create a FastqFileDataStore of all the records in the given fastq file with the given DataStoreProviderHint to help jillion choose a datastore implementation. If filtering records is desired, pleas use FastqFileDataStoreBuilder.
        Parameters:
        fastqFile - the fastq file make a FastqFileDataStore with; can not be null and must exist.
        codec - the FastqQualityCodec to use; can not be null.
        hint - the DataStoreProviderHint to use; can not be null.
        Returns:
        a new FastqFileDataStore; will never be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the fasta file does not exist, or can not be read.
        NullPointerException - if any parameter is null.
        Since:
        5.3
        See Also:
        NucleotideFastaFileDataStoreBuilder
